text:
I recently engaged this company for several framing projects, including canvas artwork, posters, and even a customized framed mirror. I couldn‚Äôt be happier with the entire experience!

Their service is outstanding‚Äîthey are responsive on WhatsApp, provide clear and transparent quotations, and handle everything professionally. The installation was seamless, and I really appreciated their fuss-free pickup service for my artwork, which made the process so convenient.

The quality of their framing work is excellent, and their pricing is reasonable for the level of craftsmanship and service provided. If you‚Äôre looking for a reliable, professional, and customer-friendly framing service, I highly recommend them!

The full-length tint bronze mirror installed by SGFrames has exceeded my expectations. Given the uneven walls in my house, I required a mirror with a back panel, which SGFrames efficiently installed. Their prices were competitive, and the final result has greatly improved my home's appearance. I would like to thank SGFrames and salesperson Joe for their outstanding service and prompt attention to my needs.

Sir Joe and the team do a really nice frames. I just had my one and at first glance it was like a real window in my office.

Sir Joe is a very kind and polite as well. He will reply to your concerns and issues politely and will give you a best recommendation and solution.

Thank you SG frame

Have been going to SG Frames to frame my 3 sets 6000 pcs of jigsaw puzzles. Very nicely done.

The guys who came to do the installation is skilful and nice. They are also very helpful. Today, they helped to take down my 6000 pcs of jigsaw puzzle and move to my new place to put it up.

The guys even helped me to put up my painting and clock. Appreciate the good service...

Seller did a very good job with the mirror. Mirror was done in a beautiful half moon shape, customise to the measurements that I requested. They also offer good price and reply to any questions promptly. Installation was done quick and hassle free. Highly recommended. üëç
